attributes.action: Deregulate HBOS from Lloyds, compensate Lloyds and nationalise HBOS immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government have got it wrong.  I strongly believe the Government should now enforce the deregulation of HBOS from Lloyds, compensate Lloyds and nationalise HBOS immediately before the whole group is either nationalised or goes into administration.
